https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5jAkxm0Ispled2Z4Rke2bQsBXop.jpg In Juarez, border town between Mexico and the United States, hundreds of women disappear and are brutally murdered. In this city, where impunity and violence rule, a desperate mother seeks her daughter who has vanished without a trace. Cruces Desiertas
